content: रवण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [रु-युच्] {@--1@} Crying, roaring, screaming. {@--2@} Sonorous, sounding; उत्कंठावर्धनैः शुभ्रं रवणैरं बरं ततं <ls>Bk. 7. 14.</ls> {@--3@} Sharp, hot. {@--4@} Fickle, unsteady. {@--5@} Jesting. --णः {@--1@} A camel; <ls>Śi. 12. 2.</ls> {@--2@} The cuckoo. --णं Brass, bell-metal.
